gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components
Interface IViewComponent

All Superinterfaces:
IPreserveState
All Known Subinterfaces:
IViewComponent1D, IViewComponent2D, IViewComponent3D
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContourViewComponent, FunctionViewComponent, ImageViewComponent, SceneFramesViewComponent, SceneViewComponent, TableViewComponent, ViewComponent3D
public interface IViewComponent
extends IPreserveState

Any class that implements this interface will interpret and display data in a usable form. Examples include images, tables, and graphs.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String POINTED_AT_CHANGED
          "POINTED_AT_CHANGED" - this message String is used by view components to inform listeners that the current point has changed.
static java.lang.String SELECTED_CHANGED
          "SELECTED_CHANGED" - this message String is used by view components to inform listeners that the current selected region has changed.

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

dataChanged

void dataChanged()
This method is invoked to notify the view component when the data has changed.

addActionListener

void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener act_listener)
Add a listener to this view component. A listener will be notified when a selected point or region changes on the view component.

removeActionListener

void removeActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener act_listener)
Remove a specified listener from this view component.

removeAllActionListeners

void removeAllActionListeners()
Remove all listeners from this view component.

getDisplayPanel

javax.swing.JPanel getDisplayPanel()
Retrieve the jpanel that this component constructs.

getControls

ViewControl[] getControls()
Return controls needed by the component.

getMenuItems

ViewMenuItem[] getMenuItems()
Return view menu items needed by the component.

kill

void kill()
This method is called by the viewer to inform the view component it is no longer needed. In turn, the view component closes all windows created by it before closing.
